TextLibrary.Text: I study for 4 years, graduate top of my class, and they send me to the Erebus System? Why?
I study for 4 years, graduate top of my class, and they send me to the Erebus System? Why?
Consider this your final lesson. When you know why you were sent here, you will truly be an MRI Agent.
Consider this your final lesson. When you know why you were sent here, you will truly be an MRI Agent.
The mission briefing said something about Pirates...
The mission briefing said something about Pirates...
Pirates are a symptom of a greater disease. They are not the reason why.
Pirates are a symptom of a greater disease. They are not the reason why.
Then you know why I'm here?
Then you know why I'm here?

No. But the ways of our masters are complex. They are powerful telepaths - a road you have only just begun to walk. They see events unfolding far into the future. So you are here for a reason, and it is not Pirates.

No. But the ways of our masters are complex. They are powerful telepaths - a road you have only just begun to walk. They see events unfolding far into the future. So you are here for a reason, and it is not Pirates.
